page.title: 09 SMALLER INDUSTRIES
page.content: The raw materials used by B&B replacement windscreens company are plastic and glass. These materials are imported from Finland. There is a workforce of 4 and the average working hours are from 8-6. Fordham Thermal Systems manufacture L.P.G.pottery kilns and small furnaces.To make these they use ceramic fibre and refractory bricks. These materials are imported from the U.S.A.,France and sometimes available in the U.K. Caps Cases manufacture corrugated fibreboard cases,pallet containers and corrugated dividers. The basic raw material they use is corrugated fibreboard which is either imported from North America and Sweden or produced from reconstituted waste in the U.K.
